Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html#/c:@E.name: InfiniteScrollDirectionVertical
Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html#/c:@E.abstract: Trigger infinite scroll when the scroll view reaches the bottom.

Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html#/c:@E.name: InfiniteScrollDirectionHorizontal
Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html#/c:@E.abstract: Trigger infinite scroll when the scroll view reaches the right edge.

Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html.name: InfiniteScrollDirection
Enums/InfiniteScrollDirection.html.abstract: Enum that describes the infinite scroll direction.

Categories/UICollectionView(InfiniteScro.name: -setShouldShowInfiniteScrollHandler:
Categories/UICollectionView(InfiniteScro.abstract: Set a handler to be called to check if the infinite scroll should be shown

Categories/UITableView(InfiniteScrollCon.name: -setShouldShowInfiniteScrollHandler:
Categories/UITableView(InfiniteScrollCon.abstract: Set a handler to be called to check if the infinite scroll should be shown

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: infiniteScrollDirection
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: The direction that the infinite scroll should work in (default: InfiniteScrollDirectionVertical).

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: animatingInfiniteScroll
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: Flag that indicates whether infinite scroll is animating

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: infiniteScrollIndicatorStyle
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: Infinite scroll activity indicator style (default: UIActivityIndicatorViewStyleGray on iOS, UIActivityIndicatorViewStyleWhite on tvOS)

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: infiniteScrollIndicatorMargin
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: The margin from the scroll view content to the indicator view (Default: 11)

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: infiniteScrollTriggerOffset
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: Set adjustment for scroll coordinate used to determine when to call handler block.

Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..name: -setShouldShowInfiniteScrollHandler:
Categories/UIScrollView(InfiniteScroll)..abstract: Set a handler to be called to check if the infinite scroll should be shown
